ALONDO: So that brings up your question in trying to determine with what value you're getting for the marketing dollar and thatâ€™s said in the price. Which of these stages have we determined what people are willing to pay and how do you get them to answer that question honestly? FEI: Yeah, pricing is a huge issue for sure and there are tons of different approaches, and honestly something that Iâ€™m still trying to figure out. FEI: Yeah, so on a high level, the big steps are you first want to identify a customer segment that you want to build an app for, and that segment ideally should be small; it should be niche, it should be a segment that has money to spend on an app. Then, you want to be finding a painful or itchy problem for those people, and painful would be something that they're ready to spend money for right away; itchy might be something that has to be more habitual to the users.
